phrases: Ah... I cannot come up with anything good.
It is unusual to see you lost in thought.
Sounds like you are doing well.
I am in super-motivated mode right now!
Sounds like you are doing well.
I am in super-motivated mode right now!
In her case, it is not just about becoming a Prima.
Hey, did you hear about Alice Carroll?
Two weeks ago, she was promoted to Prima even though she was a Pair, right?
She is the first one to ever do that!
And yet, Aika does not seem like she is fazed by it at all, does she?
Do you think her cheerfulness is just a front?
Well, Alice is the up-and-coming top Undine at our rival company, after all.
As Himeya's heir, I am sure she is feeling a lot of pressure.
Do you remember that day Oboeteimasuka ano hi o
When your heart suddenly began to race Futo kanjita tokimeki o
The rays from the blue sky were pouring over you...
I could not look away, and when our eyes met Mitoreru to me ga atte
I could not help but smile Egao koboreta
It is just like a spiral Marude supiraare
As the days begin to swirl in brilliant colors Azayaka ni mawaridashita hibi
Always and forever, they are filled with love Itsumo itsudemo ai ga michiteita
Surely, it is a spiral Kitto supiraare
The days passed by, each one filled with warmth Atataka na mainichi o kasanetara
And before I knew it, off in the distance...
Of all the many water guide companies, thank you for choosing Himeya today.
It was a lot of fun.
It was a lot of fun.
From the bottom of my heart, I hope that your vacation will be a memorable one.
I hope you become a Prima soon!
We will be rooting for you.
Both Himeya and I look forward to seeing you again during your next visit!
By any chance, did I give them wrong information during the tour?
Then, was I going over the speed limit somewhere?
After this, all I have left today is a night cruise.
And I will be joining you as your assistant, remember?
I found a really good gelato shop the other day.
Are not you going to have one, Akira?
But you are the one who asked me to come with you.
Be thankful and just eat it.
You should have gotten one too, Akira.
You heard about it too, right?
About Junior skipping a rank and getting promoted to Prima.
I got to see the very moment it happened, together with Akari.
In fact, we had front row seats.
One of her gloves was removed, and then off came her other glove.
I cannot tell you how surprised I was!
Girl geniuses sure do things differently.
I have got a lot of catching up to do!
I, Aika S. Granzchesta of Himeya, am all fired up!
You know that feeling you get when someone is running just a bit ahead of you, pulling you along?
It is how you feel when you know you are running faster than usual.
This is my chance to excel further as an Undine, Akira!
So please train me hard, okay, Akira?
Right now, I will be able to handle even the harshest criticisms!
Aika, do you have anything planned for next month's holiday?
I am completely free that day, so I am going shopping with Al.
That is the only day I have off.
You will be spending the entire day with me.
What happened to that spirit you had a moment ago?
I figured I should get your opinion, as well.
I will not forgive you if you fail.
But really, you should not have crumpled up this paper.
Everything is for the sake of my beloved Rosen Queen.
Please get used to being called by your alias.
Your customers are waiting for you.
Since I became a Prima, every day has been frantic.
The days go by like a hectic whirlwind.
If I have time to think, I just start to worry, so I suppose it is better this way.
This is the Bridge of Sighs.
It looks as though it is made of stone, but surprisingly, the inside is made of wood.
Let us go see it later.
If you prefer, I can put in a tour reservation for you.
Would you like me to do that?
Could you do that for us, please?
Since the moon-gazing party, it is been...
What is the name of that island over there, Miss Undine?
If you climb the bell tower there, you can see a sweeping view of the coastline.
In that case, why do not we go there after we visit the Bridge of Sighs?
Until recently, we used to spend every day together, too.
I have not been able to see them for quite a while now.
It is always like this, lately.
I should not go see them unannounced.
I am sure it would be a bother if I said I wanted to come visit this late at night.
Besides, I do not have a reason.
I do not have an excuse.
Athena, you are going to be late.
This building, which is currently being restored, was built in the seventeenth century.
It is the Basilica di Santa Maria della Salute.
Marco Polo was a famous Venetian merchant and author, and this is a replica of his home.
Currently, it is open to the public as a memorial hall, so perhaps you would like to visit if you are in the area?
The Palazzo Pisani Moretta is famous for its masquerade ball, and its beautiful Gothic interior.
I never knew gondola rides were so comfortable!
I never knew gondola rides were so comfortable!
Next time we come to Aqua, we will be sure to ride with you again, Alice.
Hey, what should we do for dinner?
What do you want to eat?
Sure, just leave it here when you come back.
But there are a lot of fun things, too.
I have so many things I want to tell them.
All I want is to see them.
Will I ever be able to see them again?
Slap Slap Slap Slap Slap-slap, slap-slap!
What a really ominous thing to say!
And after all those times Aika told me No negative thinking allowed!
What are you doing here at this time of night?
What is with that tone of yours?
After we came all this way to see you, too.
You know that pizza shop we always go to?
I heard it is really delicious, so I thought we should all try it together.
Come on, let us eat while it is still hot.
You just ate all those bananas.
Just a few moments ago, I was fretting about what I would do if I never saw them again, too.
That even if I want to see them, I do not have the time or an excuse to do so.
Just when I was thinking all that...
You were worried about something like that?
That is a bad habit, Junior.
If you do not have the time, you just make it, like we are doing now.
But... I do not have an excuse...
I have not been able to do much of anything lately.
I do not have an excuse like this pizza to see you.
We do not need an excuse or a special reason to see you.
I am going to do my best to catch up to you, Junior.
With these friends, I will really be just fine!
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
As my thoughts focus intently on someone, Dareka no koto o tsuyoku omou toki
Love rests on my palm, held high Kakageta te no hira ni ai ga tomaru
A future guided by the flow of water and wind Mizu no yukue to kaze ga shimesu mirai
I gaze at the hope that surrounds this world Kono hoshi o tsusumu kibou mitsumete
The distant clouds of light are beckoning now Tooi kumo hikari ga sasou you ni yureru i am about to
A shore awash in golden waves Kin no nami kishibe ni
Filled with yearning, I open my eyes and it is morning Akogare mezameru no asa ni
